short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamically splits the current tab into multiple windows side by side on the current screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Split Screen streamlines your browsing experience by effortlessly dividing your Chrome window into multiple, neatly arranged sections. Whether you're managing multiple tasks, comparing information, or enhancing productivity on large monitors, this extension saves you time by automating window resizing and placement. Install Split Screen to optimize your workspace and focus on what truly matters without the hassle of manual adjustments.
